Room.Name: Kista Planning Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large room with a big oak table in the center of the room.
Room.LongDescription: With all the blueprints and other documents lying around, this place must be where all the great planners come to work on building new cities for their ever-expanding population. There are enough chairs for eight people here, no doubt for two representatives from each race plus two chairs for guests. There are also a few chairs along the wall.
